Package com.rigado.rigablue

com.rigado.rigablue is the Rigado SDK for Android Bluetooth LE development on Android.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IRigCoreBluetoothCommon
    Interface covering method common to RigCoreBluetooth.
    IRigCoreBluetoothConnectionObserver
    This interface is used by the low level bluetooth operations in Rigablue.
    IRigCoreBluetoothDeviceObserver
    This interface provides callback methods for the low level bluetooth manager regarding device characteristic state transitions.
    IRigCoreBluetoothDiscoveryObserver
    This interface provides methods for device discovery operations performed by the low level Bluetooth stack.
    IRigCoreListener
    This interface listens to events coming directly from the low level Bluetooth interface on Android.
    IRigDataRequest
    This interface provides a function for post operation requests to the low level Bluetooth functions.
    IRigFirmwareUpdateManagerObserver
    This interface provides methods for updating the UI status during a firmware update.
    IRigFirmwareUpdateServiceObserver
    This interface provides methods for dealing with state changes of the Bluetooth device during firmware updates.
    IRigLeBaseDeviceObserver
    This interface provides methods for getting state updates from RigLeBaseDevice objects.
    IRigLeConnectionManagerObserver
    This interface provides methods for handling device connection events.
    IRigLeDescriptorObserver  
    IRigLeDiscoveryManagerObserver  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    RigAvailableDeviceData
    This class provides data storage for available Bluetooth devices.
    RigBluetoothGattCallback
    This class is a callback method handler for BluetoothGatt events.
    RigCoreBluetooth
    This class manages interactions with the BluetoothGatt objects representing device connections.
    RigDescriptorReadRequest  
    RigDeviceRequest
    This class provides a wrapper for data pertaining to device requests.
    RigDfuError
    Instances of RigDfuError are passed to callbacks when a bootloader operation fails.
    RigFirmwareUpdateManager
    This class manages the entire firmware update process based on the provided input images and bootloader reset command.
    RigFirmwareUpdateService
    This class provides glueing of the Rigado DFU service to the firmware update manager.
    RigLeBaseDevice
    This class provides and object representation of a Bluetooth device with all of its available services and characteristics.
    RigLeConnectionManager
    This class provides methods for managing connections to available Bluetooth devices.
    RigLeDiscoveryManager
    This class provides a way for apps to discovery available Bluetooth devices and read the advertisement data present in their broadcasts.
    RigLog
    This class provides logging functionality for Rigablue.
    RigNotificationStateChangeRequest
    This class provides a Data Request implementation for request changes in notification state for a characteristic.
    RigReadRequest
    This class provides a Data Request implementation for request a read of a characteristics value.
    RigService
    Service class for managing connection and data communication with a GATT server hosted on a given Bluetooth LE device.
    RigWriteRequest
    This class provides a Data Request implementation for writing data to the value of a characteristic.

Package com.rigado.rigablue Description

com.rigado.rigablue is the Rigado SDK for Android Bluetooth LE development on Android. See our Getting Started guide or the SDK repository's README for more information and examples.
